name: SQLServerTaskRunner
description: Run SQL Server scripts on a remote database
author: Carlos Flor

inputs.name: databaseserver
inputs.label: Database Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The database name can be 128 characters or less

inputs.name: databasename
inputs.label: Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name or network address of the instance of SQL Server to which to connect. The port number can be specified after the `server name: server=tcp:servername, portnumber`

inputs.name: databaseuser
inputs.label: Database User
inputs.helpMarkDown: User account with the correct privileges to access the database

inputs.name: databasepassword
inputs.label: Database Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the SQL Server account logging on

inputs.name: querysource
inputs.label: Script Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target script type, must be a file path or inline script

inputs.name: filepath
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the file with SQL script to execute
